title: Black LGBT People are Still Black | OLAY & FRIENDS
description:
SCOTUS has declared it constitutional to discriminate against LGBT people, republicans have passed more anti-trans legislation in the last 2 years than ever before in American history, and the erasure of Black queer people is constant and dangerous.
